presentationTable.name: Facts - Journey Tasks
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to journey tasks assigned to the workers through journeys

presentationColumns.name: Number of Tasks
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Tasks in the allocated journey

presentationColumns.name: Number of Mandatory Tasks
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Mandatory Tasks in allocated journey
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Number of Mandatory Tasks

presentationColumns.name: Number of Completed Tasks
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Tasks completed in allocated journey
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Number of Completed Tasks

presentationColumns.name: Number of Mandatory Tasks Completed
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Mandatory Tasks completed in allocated journey
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Number of Mandatory Tasks Completed

presentationColumns.name: Days to Complete the Task - Planned
presentationColumns.description: Estimated number of days to complete the task
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Days to Complete the Task - Planned

localization.localizationKey: Days to Complete the Task - Planned

presentationColumns.name: Days to Complete the Task - Actual
presentationColumns.description: Actual Number of days to complete the task
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Days to Complete the Task - Actual

localization.localizationKey: Days to Complete the Task - Actual

presentationColumns.name: Tasks - Not Applicable
presentationColumns.description: Tasks that are marked as not applicable

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Tasks
presentationColumns.description: Active Tasks where the target end date is in the past

presentationColumns.name: Number of Tasks Completed beyond Due Date
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Tasks completed in allocated journey after the target completion date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Journeys.Number of Tasks Completed beyond Due Date

localization.localizationKey: Number of Tasks Completed beyond Due Date
